mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM rnum , aa.* from (select * from MEMBER order by MEM_AUTH desc, MEM_STATE, MEM_EMAIL ) aa) where rnum>#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}

select aa.MEM_EMAIL, bb.MEM_NICK, aa.cnt from (select MEM_EMAIL, count(MEM_EMAIL) as cnt from PAYMENT_INFO group by MEM_EMAIL order by cnt desc) aa, MEMBER bb where aa.MEM_EMAIL = bb.MEM_EMAIL and rownum <= 3

select aa.MEM_EMAIL, bb.MEM_NICK, aa.cnt from (select MEM_EMAIL, COUNT(MEM_EMAIL) as cnt from MENTORING_REVIEW group by MEM_EMAIL order by cnt desc) aa, MEMBER bb where aa.MEM_EMAIL = bb.MEM_EMAIL and rownum <= 3
select * from (select ROWNUM rnum , aa.* from (select * from MEMBER order by MEM_POINT desc) aa) where rnum>0 and rnum<=3
select * from (select ROWNUM rnum , aa.* from (select * from MEMBER order by MEM_RDATE desc) aa) where rnum>0 and rnum<=3
mapper.update: update MEMBER set mem_state= 2 where mem_email = #{mem_email}
mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM rnum , aa.* from (select * from MENTOR_LIST order by MEM_EMAIL) aa) where rnum>#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update MENTOR_LIST set ml_apply = 0 where mem_email = #{mem_email}
